mapper.update: update KRrecruit set recCount=recCount+1 where recId=#{recId}
mapper.select: select recId,recStart,recEnd,recContent,recSite, recReadCnt,recStatus,jobpId,r from (select recId,recStart,recEnd,recContent,recSite, recReadCnt,recStatus,jobpId,rownum r from (select recId,recStart,recEnd,recContent,recSite, recReadCnt,recStatus,jobpId from KRrecruit order by recStart desc) order by recStart desc) where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
